title: Accura Link â€“ Medical Coding & Insurance System
description: Accura Link is a secure medical coding system that extracts data from medical documents, maps ICD codes, and determines insurance outcomes. Built with Spring Boot microservices architecture, integrated with AWS Cognito for secure authentication, and optimized for high-volume chart analytics.
features: Dynamic API routing with API Gateway

title: AI Powered Coal Mine Safety and Shift Management
description: An AI-driven system for coal mine worker safety, automated attendance, and shift management using computer vision and real-time compliance checks. Implements facial recognition-based attendance tracking and safety gear detection using OpenCV and PyTorch.
features: Safety gear detection using image processing

title: Weather Forecasting Web Application
description: A responsive weather forecasting application that provides real-time weather updates and 7-day forecasts using third-party APIs. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring geolocation-based forecasts and responsive design for all devices.
